config.chat.formatGeneric.tooltip: Chat format used for standard players
config.chat.formatOperator.tooltip: Chat format used for server operators
config.chat.replacements.tooltip: Regular expressions to match and replace
config.event.usernameClickEnabled.toolti: Should add clicking of a username in chat
config.event.usernameClickAction.tooltip: Action to be used upon click of a username in chat (OPEN_URL, RUN_COMMAND, SUGGEST_COMMAND, CHANGE_PAGE)
config.event.usernameClickValue.tooltip: Value to use in conjunction with username click action
